@@ -0,0 +1,35 @@
+/*

+ * accompanied this code).
+ *
+ * You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License version
+ * 2 along with this work; if not, write to the Free Software Foundation,
+ * Inc., 51 Franklin St, Fifth Floor, Boston, MA 02110-1301 USA.
+ *
+ * Please contact Oracle, 500 Oracle Parkway, Redwood Shores, CA 94065 USA
+ * or visit www.oracle.com if you need additional information or have any
+ * questions.
+ */
+
+/*
+ * @test
+ * @key key1
+ * @bug 1234567
+ * @key key2
+ */
+public class KeyMoreThanOnce {
+    public static void main(final String[] args) throws Exception {
+        throw new RuntimeException("Test was never expected to be invoked because" +
+                " it has more than one @key in its definition");
+    }
+}

@@ -2,1 +2,1 @@
-# Copyright (c) 2017, 2025, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
+# Copyright (c) 2017, 2026, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
@@ -34,1 +34,1 @@
-		-jdk:$(JDK8HOME) \
+		-jdk:$(JDKHOME) \
@@ -47,1 +47,1 @@
-		-jdk:$(JDK8HOME) \
+		-jdk:$(JDKHOME) \
@@ -61,1 +61,1 @@
-		-jdk:$(JDK8HOME) \
+		-jdk:$(JDKHOME) \
@@ -67,1 +67,1 @@
-	$(GREP) -s 'Test results: error: 2' $(@:%.ok=%/jt.log)  > /dev/null
+	$(GREP) -s 'Test results: error: 3' $(@:%.ok=%/jt.log)  > /dev/null
@@ -70,0 +70,1 @@
+	$(GREP) -s 'test result: Error. @key may be used at most once in a given test' $(@:%.ok=%/work)/KeyMoreThanOnce.jtr  > /dev/null
@@ -72,1 +73,0 @@
-ifdef JDK8HOME
@@ -77,1 +77,0 @@
-endif
